title: Pitches from companies
segmentation: I am black Schoonover.
I'm from the company um, all we are.
We are a family company here in Slovenia.
We are operating since 1991.
Currently we have 11 employees.
We have our own production line as as well as several agency agreements with other companies, mostly from Germany.
Our primary primary products are helpful in appoxee coding and mortars.
Here we have the whole range of water based.
Epoxy coatings classic epoxy coatings.
Standard coatings self leveling coating supporting mortars tile Gert.
Then we also produce hydrophobic impregnations for stone and concrete and arrange of wood, lacquers and varnishes.
We also sell swimming paint, swimming pool, paint and paint for galvanized surfaces.
We also have an engineering Department that closely cooperates with several epoxy applicator applicator companies and in this arrangements we.
We make about 100,000 square meters of oxy flooring per year.
And now why we hear our antibacterial program?
We developed our own anti anti Big Trouble anti bacterial systems with the help of our German partners.
And it is based on silver and silver ions.
In our products we use micronized silver particles.
The particles with about 10 microns in diameter.
They have a sponge like structure, so they're very.
They have a very large surface area which allows them to.
To exclude a lot of this silver ions as the silver goes and the.
Yeah, OK, the 1st.
The micronized silver is not dangerous to humans because it cannot penetrate the skin or the mucosa tissue.
And also we use pure Noble silver.
It is not mixed with any chemicals or organic solvents, so it is safe and it also does not corrode.
Effects of silver on on the micro organisms are inhibition of transmembrane transport.
An activation of intracellular enzymes and damage to the bacterial DNA.
We work with certifies our products in quality Labs in Nuremberg, Germany.
There are independent laboratory who specializes in testing surface materials for with microorganisms.
The tests have shown that on our products the bacteria cannot prove proliferate and there are no living bacteria.
After six hours the tests were done on the bacteria is most commonly found in hospitals such as strict Staphylococcus, epidermis, MERSA, and bacteria found in mostly in food industry.
Equaly all the tests were positive positive.
Here is a range of our products.
Antimicrobial products happily in a B that is the range of our antimicrobial epoxy coating.
Here we offer.
Water based epoxy coating.
Classic self leveling epoxy and epoxy tile grout.
All these coatings, as all the boxes are, are very resistant to cleaning agents and also very resistant to most of the chemicals.
They are very strong and durable and have an excellent mechanical resistance, so there they stay in for a long time.
We also have a range of antimicrobial paints.
Here we offer Latics and Krill paints.
All our pins are breathable, elastic and abrasion resistant and.
Yeah, OK.
Use though our products multi suitable for areas that demand high hygiene standards such as hospital clinics, home for elderly laboratories.
We also had some questions about industry such as pharmaceutical industries and food industry, bigger industrial kitchens and public very heavily trafficked public areas such as swimming pools.
Current installations where these are the installments we know about because we were involved in the projects.
The time of this installments Weather Years 2015 2016.

Our hospital world Ultra that is in anchor and then when they made a new surgical Ward, the walls of the surgical wards were painted with oil paints, General Hospital Doc France undergone czernobog Rizza in new Emergency Center Hospital, Lucas Ljubljana.
Here the new format logical clinic maternity hospital in Ljubljana the when they're refurbishing the new delivery Ward.
We had some several other applications that are not maybe in the health Department such as fish tanks for foot in fish farms, certain bakeries, and as I said before, public swimming pools.
We also had some conversations about putting our and we are making tests to put this antimicrobial coatings internals because they have a very big problem with mold.
So in.
Challenges yes.
Our only challenge practically is price.
The.
These coatings have added value and there are more expensive.
And here comes the problem.
'cause we always offer our range of antimicrobial coatings, but.
The the engineers like the idea.
The project managers like the idea, but the investors who designed the budget they have a problem with the price.
So this is the first problem and the other problem is the.
As I said the our install this product in 2015 2016 which means we didn't.
We don't have a lot of long-term testing done.
Is the most we have done is that it was the testing in tunnels because the mold there is very aggressive and they.
Every year they report to us that they are very happy with antimicrobial coating internals because because cleaning is much much easier.

They say that the there is still some mold on it, but you can basically just clean it down with water while the normal paid they have to bring specialized equipment to clean the mold from the surface.
Oh yeah.
This was a short presentation of our company.
Thank you very much.
